name: wind power plant construction, 800kW, moving parts | wind power plant, 800kW, moving parts | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5087/documentation

Lifetime is assumed to be 20 years. Annual electricity production is assumed to be about 1.4 GWh. Data are from a Nordex N50/800 plant.



Includes materials used for moving parts: rotor, nacelle, electric parts, and their disposal. Also includes the processing, the energy requirements for assembling, the transports needed, and  the connection to the grid.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data for a specific 800kW wind power plant. Represents European installation conditions.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average European technology for a 800 kW wind power plant.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: none This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography Europe without Switzerland. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.

exchanges.description: EcoSpold01Location=RER

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=CH
Estimation. For assembling the individual parts an electricity consumption of 0.5 kWh/kg for a total mass of 35 t is assumed (35'000 kg * 0.5 kWh = 17'500 kWh). The mass has to be lifted the entire height of the tower. The effort is estimated by means of potential energy (Epot = m*g*h = 35'000 kg*10 ms-2*45 m = 15.75 MJ = 4.375 kWh). The additional electrictiy consumption, including horizontal movements and losses can be estimated at about 10 kWh.

Further references:
Baumann T., Mnard M. (1993) Der kumulierte Energieaufwand - Methode und Resultate der Input-Output-Analyse. Diplomarbeit am Laboratorium fr Energiesysteme, ETH Zrich.
